column2: Players and the AI can ask for money to someone who owes them a favor.
Only the players can ask for money to someone who owes them a favor.
Nobody can ask for money to someone who owes them a favor.
§RTides of Warcraft§! (§BHorse Lords§!): Nomad Clans Holding Pillage
Nomad rulers can pillage vassal baron level holdings if they own the county.
Nomad rulers can only pillage holdings they own.
